item.title: Creating two node Nomad cluster
item.author: sklenar.pav@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Pavel Sklenar
item.description: Nomad is an interesting alternative to Kubernetes. As authors of Nomad say, it is a suplement to Kubernetes and offers some great features. Here you can find a guide on how to create a fresh Nomad cluster with two nodes. The first node acts as a server and client, the second node acts as a client only. I know this architecture is not recommended for production purposes, but I would like to test it only.
